about_the_game:
My Dad Is A Hero

"My Dad Is A Hero" is a single-player action RPG story adventure where two heroes, bound by fate, face their struggles and uncover the truth of their world.

A Tale of Two Heroes

Listen to the story of two extraordinary heroes.
Mehiron lost both his father and mother at a young age, growing up with a dream of following in his father’s footsteps as a hero.
Meanwhile, Titan, a 7-year veteran hero and co-leader of the Intelligence Division, begins gathering information about the strange monsters that have started to appear.
What could be happening in their world?

Game Overview

Mehiron: A young man who lost his parents at an early age and grew up holding onto his dream of becoming a hero like his father.
Titan: A 7-year veteran hero and co-leader of the Intelligence Division, now investigating the sudden appearance of mysterious monsters.

As their paths intertwine, the two protagonists uncover secrets that threaten the world.
What destiny awaits them?

Key Features

  • Dual Protagonists:
    Experience the intertwined stories of Mehiron and Titan by alternating between their perspectives.

  • Three Epic Acts:
    Unravel hidden truths in each act as the threat to the world intensifies.

  • Challenging Boss Fights:
    Engage in thrilling battles against powerful bosses with unique patterns and strategies.

  • Blend of Action and Adventure:
    Enjoy fast-paced combat combined with an immersive narrative for a unique experience.
